guides.name: Bob
guides.biography: Bob is an expert guide and instructor, and has been running rivers with us for over 20 years!

guides.name: Larry
guides.biography: Larry is an experienced raft guide, who navigates with ease, and makes sure rafters have a blast!

guides.name: Petunia
guides.biography: Petunia is an excellent raft guide, and one of the best kayakers you've ever seen!

guides.name: Archie
guides.biography: Archie is a fantastic river guide, born and raised in Riggins, he knows all there is to know about the river!

guides.name: Laura
guides.biography: Laura may be our newest and youngest guide, but there's no mistaking her incredible rafting skill!
